entry.title: Cordic Algorithm
entry.content:
MathjaxKatex,

[6]CORDIC1957J.VolderCORDICHewlett Packard,CORDIC(1)CORDICFPGACORDICDSP(MIMO)

CORDIC

Cordic

(x1,y1)(x_1,y_1)(x1,y1)(x2,y2)(x_2,y_2)(x2,y2)(x2,y2)(x_2,y_2)(x2,y2)

x2=x1cosy1cosy2=x1sin+y1cosx_2 = x_1cos-y_1cos \\y_2 = x_1sin+y_1cosx2=x1cosy1cosy2=x1sin+y1cos

111

x2=cos(+)=cos()cos()sin()sin()=x1cosy1cosy2=sin(+)=sin()cos()+cos()sin()=x1sin+y1cosx_2=cos(+) = cos()cos() - sin()sin() =x_1cos-y_1cos \\y_2=sin(+) = sin()cos() + cos()sin() =x_1sin+y_1cosx2=cos(+)=cos()cos()sin()sin()=x1cosy1cosy2=sin(+)=sin()cos()+cos()sin()=x1sin+y1cos

[x2y2]=[cossinsincos][x1y1]\left[\begin{matrix} x_2\\ y_2 \end{matrix}\right]=\left[\begin{matrix} cos&-sin\\ sin&cos \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} x_1\\ y_1 \end{matrix}\right][x2y2]=[cossinsincos][x1y1]

[x1y1]=[cossinsincos][x2y2]\left[\begin{matrix} x_1\\ y_1 \end{matrix}\right]=\left[\begin{matrix} cos&sin\\ -sin&cos \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} x_2\\ y_2 \end{matrix}\right][x1y1]=[cossinsincos][x2y2]

FPGAx2x_2x2y2y_2y2

(x1,y1)=(100,200)(x_1,y_1)=(100,200)(x1,y1)=(100,200)(,)(,)(,)arctan(y/x)arctan(y/x)arctan(y/x)(,)=(223.61,63.435)(,) = (223.61,63.435)(,)=(223.61,63.435)

(0,90)(0,90)(0,90)454545

[xy]=[cos(45)sin(45)sin(45)cos(45)][100200]=[212.1370.711]\left[\begin{matrix} x\\ y \end{matrix}\right]=\left[\begin{matrix} cos(45)&sin(45)\\ -sin(45)&cos(45) \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} 100\\ 200 \end{matrix}\right]=\left[ \begin{matrix} 212.13\\ 70.711 \end{matrix}\right][xy]=[cos(45)sin(45)sin(45)cos(45)][100200]=[212.1370.711]

y>0y>0y>045/2=22.545/2=22.545/2=22.545+22.5=67.545+22.5=67.545+22.5=67.5

[xy]=[cos(22.5)sin(22.5)sin(22.5)cos(22.5)][212.1370.711]=[223.0415.85]\left[\begin{matrix} x\\ y \end{matrix}\right]=\left[\begin{matrix} cos(22.5)&sin(22.5)\\ -sin(22.5)&cos(22.5) \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} 212.13\\ 70.711 \end{matrix}\right]=\left[ \begin{matrix} 223.04\\ -15.85 \end{matrix}\right][xy]=[cos(22.5)sin(22.5)sin(22.5)cos(22.5)][212.1370.711]=[223.0415.85]

y<0y<0y<022.5/2=11.2522.5/2=11.2522.5/2=11.2545+22.511.25=56.2545+22.5-11.25=56.2545+22.511.25=56.25

[xy]=[cos(11.25)sin(11.25)sin(11.25)cos(11.25)][223.0415.85]=[221.8527.967]\left[\begin{matrix} x\\ y \end{matrix}\right]=\left[\begin{matrix} cos(11.25)&-sin(11.25)\\ sin(11.25)&cos(11.25) \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} 223.04\\ -15.85 \end{matrix}\right]=\left[ \begin{matrix} 221.85\\ 27.967 \end{matrix}\right][xy]=[cos(11.25)sin(11.25)sin(11.25)cos(11.25)][223.0415.85]=[221.8527.967]

y>0y>0y>011.25/2=5.62511.25/2=5.62511.25/2=5.62545+22.511.25+5.625=61.87545+22.5-11.25+5.625=61.87545+22.511.25+5.625=61.875

[xy]=[cos(5.625)sin(5.625)sin(5.625)cos(5.625)][221.8527.967]=[223.526.0874]\left[\begin{matrix} x\\ y \end{matrix}\right]=\left[\begin{matrix} cos(5.625)&sin(5.625)\\ -sin(5.625)&cos(5.625) \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} 221.85\\ 27.967 \end{matrix}\right]=\left[ \begin{matrix} 223.52\\ 6.0874 \end{matrix}\right][xy]=[cos(5.625)sin(5.625)sin(5.625)cos(5.625)][221.8527.967]=[223.526.0874]

[xi+1yi+1]=[cos(i)disin(i)disin(i)cos(i)][xiyi]=cos(i)[1ditan(i)ditan(i)1][xiyi]zi+1={zi+i,ifyi>0zii,ifyi0wheredi={+1,ifyi>01,ifyi0,i=452i\left[\begin{matrix} x_{i+1}\\ y_{i+1} \end{matrix}\right]=\left[\begin{matrix} cos(_i)&d_isin(_i)\\ -d_isin(_i)&cos(_i) \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} x_i\\ y_i \end{matrix}\right]=cos(_i)\left[\begin{matrix} 1&d_itan(_i)\\ -d_itan(_i)&1 \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} x_i\\ y_i \end{matrix}\right]\\z_{i+1} = \begin{cases}z_i + _i, & \text{if $y_i$>0} \\z_i - _i, & \text{if $y_i$0}\end{cases}\\where\ d_i =\begin{cases}+1, & \text{if $y_i$>0} \\-1, & \text{if $y_i$0}\end{cases}\ ,_i=\frac{45}{2^i}[xi+1yi+1]=[cos(i)disin(i)disin(i)cos(i)][xiyi]=cos(i)[1ditan(i)ditan(i)1][xiyi]zi+1={zi+i,zii,ifyi>0ifyi0wheredi={+1,1,ifyi>0ifyi0,i=2i45

[xi+1yi+1]=[cos(i)disin(i)disin(i)cos(i)][xiyi]=cos(i)[1ditan(i)ditan(i)1][xiyi]=cos(i)[1di2idi2i1][xiyi]zi+1=zi+diiwheredi={+1,ifyi>01,ifyi0,i=arctan(12i)\left[\begin{matrix} x_{i+1}\\ y_{i+1} \end{matrix}\right]=\left[\begin{matrix} cos(_i)&d_isin(_i)\\ -d_isin(_i)&cos(_i) \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} x_i\\ y_i \end{matrix}\right]=cos(_i)\left[\begin{matrix} 1&d_itan(_i)\\ -d_itan(_i)&1 \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} x_i\\ y_i \end{matrix}\right]=cos(_i)\left[\begin{matrix} 1&\frac{d_i}{2^i}\\ -\frac{d_i}{2^i}&1 \end{matrix}\right]\left[\begin{matrix} x_i\\ y_i \end{matrix}\right]\\z_{i+1} = z_i + d_i_i\\\\where\ d_i = \begin{cases}+1, & \text{if $y_i$>0} \\-1, & \text{if $y_i$0}\end{cases},\ _i = arctan(\frac{1}{2^i})[xi+1yi+1]=[cos(i)disin(i)disin(i)cos(i)][xiyi]=cos(i)[1ditan(i)ditan(i)1][xiyi]=cos(i)[12idi2idi1][xiyi]zi+1=zi+diiwheredi={+1,1,ifyi>0ifyi0,i=arctan(2i1)

xi+1=cos(i)(xi+diyitan(i)=cos(i)(xi+diyi2i)yi+1=cos(i)(yidixitan(i)=cos(i)(yidixi2i)zi+1=zi+diiwheredi={+1,ifyi>01,ifyi0,i=arctan(12i)x_{i+1} = cos(_i)(x_i+d_iy_itan(_i)=cos(_i)(x_i+d_i\frac{y_i}{2^i})\\y_{i+1} = cos(_i)(y_i-d_ix_itan(_i)=cos(_i)(y_i-d_i\frac{x_i}{2^i})\\z_{i+1} = z_i + d_i_i\\where\ d_i = \begin{cases}+1, & \text{if $y_i$>0} \\-1, & \text{if $y_i$0}\end{cases}, \ _i = arctan(\frac{1}{2^i})\\xi+1=cos(i)(xi+diyitan(i)=cos(i)(xi+di2iyi)yi+1=cos(i)(yidixitan(i)=cos(i)(yidi2ixi)zi+1=zi+diiwheredi={+1,1,ifyi>0ifyi0,i=arctan(2i1)
